comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:5.0) Gecko/20110706 Firefox/5.0 SeaMonkey/2.2
Build ID: 20110706120824

Steps to reproduce:

Open a message without charset= header and select proper encoding, then changed messages forth and back.


Actual results:

Encoding for that message was not saved.


Expected results:

Encoding is saved in folder index, like in good mail readers.
